The list of EVM 1 opcodes from every EVM revision.
EVMC_EXPORT const struct evmc_instruction_metrics * evmc_get_instruction_metrics_table (enum evmc_revision revision)
Get the table of the EVM 1 instructions metrics.
EVMC_EXPORT const char *const * evmc_get_instruction_names_table (enum evmc_revision revision)
Get the table of the EVM 1 instruction names.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: A collection of metrics for EVM1 instruction set.

section.title: evmc_opcode

para.para: The list of EVM 1 opcodes from every EVM revision.

para.computeroutput: EVMC_EXPORT const struct evmc_instruction_metrics * evmc_get_instruction_metrics_table (enum evmc_revision revision)

para.para: Get the table of the EVM 1 instructions metrics.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: The pointer to the array of 256 instruction metrics. Null pointer in case an invalid EVM revision provided.

section.title: evmc_get_instruction_names_table()

para.computeroutput: EVMC_EXPORT const char *const * evmc_get_instruction_names_table (enum evmc_revision revision)

para.para: Get the table of the EVM 1 instruction names.

section.para: The entries for undefined instructions contain null pointers.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: The pointer to the array of 256 instruction names. Null pointer in case an invalid EVM revision provided.
